lenders.name: Joe & Kayla
lenders.loan_because: God has truly blessed our lives with Love, Family, and Good Fortune...and we want to share those blessing with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Joe and I are both blessed with two wonderful children and wonderful careers. Joe works for a world wide company based out of Sweden and is in charge of making sure that the suppliers to the U.S. stores ship all the products on time and only use material vendors that are enviromentaly friendly and approved by his company. Kayla maintains relationships with current clients and establishes new relationships to further business....basically Im in sales. We hope that we are able to help people around the world to reach their goals and support their familys. Kiva is a wonderful organization and we send our Thank You to them for enabling us to help you!

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe to those much is given, much is required.

lenders.occupational_info: Design electrical stuff that test's other electrical stuff

lenders.loan_because: I believe that people are inherently good.  When given an opportunity that they would not have otherwise had, greatness can be achieved.  My favorite quote is "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."  I'm honored to be able to contribute, even in a small way, to the dreams and aspirations of so many amazing individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that encourages children to become entrepreneurs and to succeed in a global economy.  I raise money to help these programs continue.

lenders.loan_because:
....life's purpose is to create more happiness and beauty!  We're all ONE, so how can I be happy, successful, or reach any degree of spiritual evolution if I'm cut off from the rest of the human family tree?

Giving is a way that I link myself to others.

lenders.name: Andrew

lenders.occupational_info: I train customers, do demos and assist with technical designs for a small software company. lenders.name: Christy

Microcredit lending works - Thanks Dr. Yunus!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with large companies to help them reduce their environmental impact by making their office environment "greener."

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: Loaning to Kiva is not like giving to charity.  It is a sustainable way to ensure your money goes a long way helping the poor start businesses in the country of your choice.  The best part about it is that you get 100% of your money back each time!
lenders.occupational_info: Microfinancing had and is continuing to have tremendous success in the development of many countries.

lenders.occupational_info:
We would like to Inform the following Message to one and all below,
 
Kindly Note 
  
Please ask your Clients and Customers in your Country of India and also in other Overseas Countries for the Business and International Trades for all the Commodities in terms of Exports or Imports of any Commodities to India or else where in the World, Business Confirmations, Trade Negotiations, Business Tie ups, Buy Backs, Machinery, Mergers, Banking in India and Overseas Countries, Offices and Trade Representations at Overseas Countries, Turn Key Projects, Project Consultations, Project Finance, Payments, Letter of Credits( L.C's), Acquisition's, Barter Trades, Bi Lateral Trades, Credits and still more to go on Lines and Prints etc, 
 
Please get in touch with our Company in India for all of your needs and requirements linking many Countries in the World with your Company or with any of your regular Clients and Customers regarding various Business, Promotions and International Trades. 
 
We now seek your high handed support, cooperation and regular follow up in this said matter and we expect you to give us some priority and preferences in these Issues.
 
We do help you in all the above mentioned situations and then we could work together and then to proceed further. 
 
This is for your Kind Attention, Consideration and Information from our side and Company in India.
 
With Warm and Kindest Regards
 
Thanking You.
 
Sincerely Yours
For Asians Pacific Corporation, India
 
RAVI KRISSHNAMURTHY
Promoter
 
Please ask your Clients and Customers in your Country of India and then to write and address their Communications to us directly and let them send all of their Company Documents and Informations in our Company's Favor in India and to our Business Address as stated below, 
 
RAVI KRISSHNAMURTHY
C E O   / Director

lenders.name: Toronto Family
lenders.loan_because:
Galatians 6:10 says, 

Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all, especially to those who are of the household of faith.

I have spent a fair bit of time in third world countries and have seen the face of poverty again and again. I thank God for the opportunity to do a small bit to lend a hand to those in need. The Lord has blessed my family and I, and we in turn want to be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info:
Preaching and teaching the good news of Jesus Christ in the Greater Toronto Area, and wherever I have the opportunity, the world over.

What a great life and what a great blessing to serve God!
